```{python}
movies_gross = movies[['US_Gross', 'Release_Date']]
movies_gross.head()
#movies_gross['release_time'] = movies_gross[movies_gross['release_date']==]
movies_gross['Release_Date']= pd.to_datetime(movies_gross['Release_Date'])
movies_gross['quarter']=movies_gross['Release_Date'].dt.quarter
grouped_by_quarter = movies_gross.groupby('quarter').agg({'US_Gross': 'median'}).reset_index()

```


```{python}
alt.Chart(movies_url).mark_point().encode(
    alt.X('month(Release_Date):T'),
    alt.Y('average(US_Gross):Q')
)
```


```{python}
alt.Chart(grouped_by_quarter, width=200).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('quarter:N', axis=alt.Axis(labelAngle=360)),
    alt.Y('US_Gross:Q')
)
```
